ygData.subject: Fozzles Jeweling strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: What I do is not make much of anything, just fill a bag of about 5 to 10 of each gem, except for Jasper and Star Rose, which I take more of. Then get metals,
ygData.messageBody:
What I do is not make much of anything, just fill a bag of about 5 to 10
of each gem, except for Jasper and Star Rose, which I take more of.
Then get metals, and go play. Wherever you go just auction tat you can
raise ANY stat by at least two, and people will start telling you for
details. Make them to order, and keep playing. Has worked great for
me! Te dow side is now that I make a lot of jewelery, I don't loot a
whoel lot because I am already carrying too much stuff =) But hey, why
bother with those bronze swords and bows and arrows when you have a sack
of money anyway?
also, look for buyers for Ruby mass, and Black Pearl Rings. These are
wicked money makers.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:11 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] pricing
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> well, i must be doing something wrong, because i never have more than
> 100pp
> at a time... can anyone give me strategies and/or areas to sell at
> good
> prices? i kinda hate being strapped for cash...
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 22nd lvl enchanter on
> Cazic-Thule
>
> At 10:05 AM 6/15/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
> >
> >I agree, though not quite as high. I have 1065 platinum in the bank
> >right now, and had about 20plat last week at this time. I sell the
> int
> >and wis rings at 10p, STR rings at 12p, and so on.
> >Also, GREAT way to make money? go to South Karanas and start
> auctioning
> >to buy Black pearls. Monks and rogues eat up that blackeded pearl
> ring!
> >Another aweseom way to make money once some electrum start to become
> >trivial is to look for 25 - 50 lvl clerics, Shamen, Druids, Paladins,
> >and shoot em a quick tell about your ruby mask, and to only respond
> if
> >interested. I been selling these masks at least one or two a night
> for
> >300pp or more. People at high levels treat money ALOT differently
> then
> >people at lower levels, and they will toss 300plat without thinking
> into
> >a ruby mask. Not any skill increase, but I am saving up a big nest
> egg
> >so I can go broke again with Gold at 24 =)
> >
> >
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: Daniel Devorkin [SMTP:devo@...]
> >> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:08 AM
> >> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> >> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] pricing
> >>
> >> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
> >>
> >> man, you guys are charging way to little for the rings of +2!!!
> >> they cost us about 6pp to make one ring, and your going and selling
> >> for 6pp
> >> or 7pp!
> >> i sell mine for 12pp for 1 and 20pp for a set of 2!!
> >> and they sell.
> >> if i sell at your prices, and fail once, i am loosing money. do not
> >> bring
> >> the market down, bring it up!
> >>
> >>
> >>
